arts.sum: Wrexham maintained their push for automatic promotion from League One with a dramatic late victory over Crawley Town on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Elliot Lee nets stoppage-time winner for Wrexham at Crawley
Wrexham add Rodriguez; sign Smith for record fee
arts.sum: Wrexham have announced the signings of former England striker Jay Rodríguez and Reading forward Sam Smith, with sources telling ESPN that the deal for Smith is a club-record fee.

arts.ttl: Wrexham confirm signing of Reading forward for 'significant undisclosed fee'
arts.sum: Wrexham have confirmed the signing of Reading forward Sam Smith for a 'significant undisclosed' deal worth a reported £2m. The 26-year-old scored 11 goals for the Royals in the first part of the season, including in Tuesday's 3-2 defeat at Burton Albion. In total, he departs for a second time with 29 goals in 67 appearances having made his debut back in 2017. However, the Academy graduate has opted to sign a three-and-a-half year deal in North Wales as Phil Parkinson's side challenge for promotion to the Championship.

arts.ttl: 'I played with Marcus Rashford and Scott McTominay - now I'm signing for Wrexham'
arts.sum: Wrexham are expected to complete the multi-million pound signing of Sam Smith from Reading, who played alongside Marcus Rashford and Scott McTominay in Manchester United's academy

Crawley are alive and kicking in their battle against relegation after producing a timely victory at Mansfield to move within three points of safety. Another shock win here could send the Red Devils ...

arts.ttl: Preview: Crawley Town vs. Wrexham - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Crawley Town and Wrexham, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: 4 Wrexham transfers Ryan Reynolds can still complete in January including mega-money deal
arts.sum: Wrexham could be in for a busy end to the January transfer window as owners Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney aim to back Phil Parkinson side's promotion challenge
